document.full_text: the wisconsin supreme court on friday rejected challenges to a life-without-parole sentence for a man who at age 14 chased down, beat and then tossed a teenager to his death off a hospital parking ramp.
document.title: life sentence for 14-year-old killer confirmed by court
lines_and_colors: the wisconsin supreme court on friday rejected challenges to a life-without-parole sentence for a man who at age 14 chased down, beat and then tossed a teenager to his death off a hospital parking ramp.
